mapper.insert: insert INTO tb_eula(id, title, content, address, createTime) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{address}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select * from tb_eula ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_eula set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, address = #{address}, createTime = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
